author: fdmanana
msg: Fix logger crash when messages have unicode characters
This closes COUCHDB-1158. Thanks Dale Harvey.

author: ate
msg: JS2-589: PermissionManagerImpl use of ThreadLocal for caching causes inconsistent results
- fixed by registering the ThreadLocal (state) cleanup operation through the new ServletRequestCleanupService (JS2-1353)

author: ate
msg: JS2-1183: Tomcat 6.0.24+ SEVERE errors logged from org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader clearThreadLocalMap
- (only) fixing the clearing of JetspeedVelocityViewServlet created ThreadLocal for the VelocityContext using new ServletRequestCleanupService from JS2-1253
